translations: 基础；[矿业]支柱（underpinning 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Childhood activities help a child develop responsibility, independence, confidence and competence — the underpinnings of emotional health.
sentences.translation: 童年活动有助于儿童培养责任感、独立、自信和能力，这些是情感健康的基础。
它是热力学的微观描述。

sentences.sentence: Now look at some underpinnings of SAX (complete with code examples).
sentences.translation: 现在，了解一些SAX基础知识(附有代码示例)。
